summary: A unit test suite that validates the functionality of an object detection label source, covering configuration building, deprecated interfaces, handling of missing or invalid URIs, conversion of polygon and multipolygon GeoJSON geometries into detection labels, and reading operations with and without spatial extents.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the object detection labeling component used in computerâ€‘vision pipelines, ensuring proper data ingestion, geometry handling, and error management before deployment.
